name: Getting Ahead - Ludum Dare 45
description:
Getting a Head is a semi finished skeleton combat game made for Ludum Dare 45

CONTROLS:

  • Move with Arrows or WASD
  • Aim with mouse
  • Throw picked up items with Right Mouse

When you start as just a head you need to collect bones to become a skeleton, after which you can engage in combat. Avoid the spikes in the lower left!

The game did not get an ultimate win condition in time, so I hope you enjoy skeletons just tossing stuff around.
